@Sladey69 - You have to burn the ISO onto a DVD or mount it using a virtual drive such as Daemon tools or MagicISO. Once mounted/burned install the game, use the keygen (rld-tsbk.exe) found in the crack folder (on the "disc"). Once installed move everything from the crack folder into your game's installation directory, which by default is C:Program FilesElectronic ArtsThe Saboteur. Once it's cracked, play, and have fun! Hope this helped you, or any one else.
